title: Remembering Salwa Bugaighis, The Libyan Advocate Who Took On Ghadafi
teaser: A prominent Libyan human rights worker was assassinated Wednesday. NPR's Leila Fadel interviewed Salwa Bugaighis earlier this month and remembers the lawyer's efforts against former dictator Moammar Gadhi's regime.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
